queries.query: insert into applications(company_name, job_title, job_description, aps, status_id, applied_date, user_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
update applications set status_id = ? where id = ?

select id, company_name, job_title, job_description, aps, status_id, DATE_FORMAT(applied_date,'%d/%m/%Y') AS applied_date, user_id, resume_id, `rank` from applications inner join application_rank on application_rank.application_id = applications.id where applications.id = ?

select id, company_name, job_title, job_description, aps, status_id, DATE_FORMAT(applied_date,'%d/%m/%Y') AS applied_date, user_id, resume_id, `rank` from applications inner join application_rank on application_rank.application_id = id where user_id = ?
select id , `rank` from applications inner join application_rank on application_rank.application_id = applications.id where user_id = ? and status_id = ?
